name: communicate
description:
Sends an email reply to specified recipients. Use this tool to communicate with users via email—such as providing summaries of completed tasks, asking follow-up questions, or sharing important updates.
 Example: {"from": "ai_assistant@superagent.diy", "to": ["John Doe <john.doe@example.com>"], "body": "Hey Mehul,

I’ve scheduled a new event in your calendar for tomorrow. Let me know if you'd like to adjust the time.

Thanks,
Superagent"
}

from.description: The email address of the agent i.e., agent_email. This will always be of an agent, as this email is in response to an email from a user.

to.description: List of recipient email addresses. Can include names in format 'First-name Last-name <email@example.com>' or just email addresses. Example: ['mehul patel <mehul.patel981@gmail.com>', 'John Doe <john.doe@example.com>']

cc.description: List of CC recipient email addresses. Can include names in format 'First-name Last-name <email@example.com>' or just email addresses. Optional field.

body.description: The main content/body of the email. Can include line breaks and formatting. Example: 'Could you please find out what's my day looks like today?\n        - Superagent\n'
